title: Describe your love/sex life with your Main Champ's quotes

replies.body: {{champion:131}} "You were alone the whole time! Bwa ha ha!" {{champion:131}}

{{champion:245}} Let me be honest - I have no idea what I'm doing
Yep... that went exactly how I didn't want it to go
If there are limits... I haven't found them yet.
Every rule needs a break.
That worked in another timeline.
I'm old enough to buy this
Never go full robot.
So, uh... how about that weather?
shouted any good names lately?
{{champion:43}} _I have seen two paths, and made another between _

> [{quoted}](name=FIuffCow,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YExgrenn,comment-id=002c,timestamp=2016-07-20T22:18:29.940+0000)
>
> {{champion:43}} _I have seen two paths, and made another between _

^This is what immediately popped into my head when I saw the title. 

{{champion:43}} "The answer lies _withhin_."

...Karma doesn't have the best quotes for sexual stuff.

One for each of my big six champions.
Disclaimer: none of these are necessarily accurate to me, they were just too good of an opportunity to pass up.

{{champion:31}} "Who will be eaten first?"
{{champion:40}} "Yes, it's true. For only $2.95 a minute, I will leave you breathless."
{{champion:10}} "Uh, oh, ah, wha- wait. See? Perfection." (Note: standard Kayle has so few lines and none that could reasonably be used as innuendo, so I used one of Aether Wing's quotes.  Sue me.)
{{champion:133}} "We're in this together."
{{champion:16}} "Yes, that was a banana. No one expects the banana."
{{champion:44}} "These gems aren't just for show."

{{champion:16}} "You think the banana is your ally?  You merely adopted the banana.  I was born with it, molded by it.  I didn't eat any other fruit until I was already fallen, by then it was nothing to me but disgusting."

{{champion:82}} 
"How delightfully painful <3 "

"No pain, no drain"

"Misery loves company"

Getting Hungry...

Want Meat!

Keep coming! Not full!
{{champion:222}}:  "Aww, c'mon, what's the worst that could happen?"

{{champion:89}} "Next time, try to leave a dent."  Challenge accepted!

If I'm delirious for some reason, the condom comes to life and pledges to protect me.

{{champion:18}}  "Is that a rocket in your pocket?"
No. :(
{{champion:143}}  Wait until my seeds take root. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:69}}  "If you want to be on top, you have to reach for it."
{{champion:245}} Somebody's day is about to get rekt.

{{champion:17}} "And now... We wait..."

The 16th reason I hate Omega Squad, I guess...

{{champion:245}}  - Not quittin till its right
{{champion:64}}  - Your will, my hands
{{champion:223}}  - Let us eat voraciously and over indulge
